entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] move emsdk setup from runtime to emsdk tooling #105439
    9.0.0
  • CertificateRequest.Create(...) hangs on macOS 12.7.5 x64 #105438
  • [API Proposal]: Methods to support ByRefLike types in "is-type" IL sequences #105435
    10.0.0
  • x86 Windows `System.IO.Tests.Directory_NotifyFilter_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_NotifyFilter_CreationTime` failure #105431
  • DOTNET_GCStress=1 or =2 is broken #105428
  • DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException test failure #105425
  • Order of attributes matters to the platform analyzer? #105423
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted wrong exception code on BSD-ish systems #105422
  • ARM64: Fuzzlyn example Debug outputs `False` and Release outputs `True` #105413
    9.0.0
  • Antigen failure: `Assert failure: Assertion failed 'arg->OperIsPutArg()` #105412
    9.0.0
  • Antigen failure: `Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate())` #105411
    9.0.0
  • Debug LDAP communication in use of class System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection #105406
    Future
  • Convert.FromHexString returning an OperationStatus throws unless destination buffer is precisely sized #105405
    9.0.0
  • `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx10v1+V512+X64.IsSupported` is not expanded and results in an infinite loop #105402
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `StrongBox.Create` #105400
    Future
  • [Wasm] Issue when defining assets for localized assemblies #105399
    9.0.0
  • Make HexConverter class public #105398
    Future
  • [AOT] In special generate argument, the aot application will crash #105397
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Failed to load AOT module "Methodical_*" #105395
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Incorrect boot.json for extensions #105393
    9.0.0
  • Memory Consumption Differences in Running .NET 6 WebAPI Linux Docker container (with DOTNET_GCHighMemPercent Configured) With and Without Docker memory Limit #105390
  • The Japanese string returned by the DateTime.ToLongDateString and DateOnly.ToLongDateString methods is incorrect. #105381
    Future
  • Ctor_Dispose_HandleClosedIfOwnsHandle failed in CI #105379
    9.0.0
  • Debugger hits SIGSEGV in ShimStackWalk::StackWalkInfo::GetCurrentInternalFrame when .NET app throws exception #105374
    9.0.0
  • Remove system zlib packages from unix native dependencies #105373

Closed

  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated #105377
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend HostApplicationBuilderSettings with ServiceProviderOptions #103730
    Future
  • classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/GenericContext/GenericContextTest takes very long under GC stress, times out on OSX-arm64 #104633
    Future
  • Any way to revert to pre-7.0 isolated assembly loading in C++/CLI? #104480
    Future
  • Warn when "attribute-dependent" types are used in 'typeof' #64655
    9.0.0
  • `MakeGenericType` generates wrong warning for annotation mismatch #104911
    9.0.0
  • App crashes when running with enabled AOT in .NET 7 Android #94571
  • [WebRequest] DefaultMaximumErrorResponseLength should be KB #105387
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8] [android] case where Mono debugger doesn't "break" correctly on unhandled exceptions #99007
    9.0.0
  • Application crash when reaching vm.map_count limit #90230
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: Fuzzlyn example Debug outputs `97` and Release outputs `0` #105414
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT failed with VS2022 17.9.0 Professional #98757
    9.0.0
  • SerialPort.GetPortNames() Error #105361
  • Problem writing a large file to ZipArchive #101238
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in System.IO.Compression #105331
    9.0.0
  • GZipStream decompression bug #105183
    9.0.0
  • `int.Parse()` invalid results on x86_64/Android: RadioButton with ControlTemplate crashes on Android in the release mode #104245
  • Consider matching ETW to fire the new events added to EventPipe #88162
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/Arrays/misc/arrres_il_r/arrres_il_r.cmd #104351
  • Invalid Zero Length check expression #105383
  • No compatiable code running on the thread #91631
    9.0.0
  • New AggregateBy / CountBy tests don't work with native AOT #92387
    9.0.0
  • [mono] System.IO.IsolatedStorage test failures on MacCatalyst #92481
    10.0.0
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests3.WithDllImportInMainAssembly test timeout (30000ms exceeded) #104830
    8.0.x
  • AspNetCore app fail to start on rocky linux 9.4 with selinux with SocketException (13): Permission denied #105320
  • On Android, DateTime.ToString("F") or ("f") returns the wrong result in Japanese locale #105097
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 4/28/2024 2:54:10 PM #101728
    9.0.0
  • Target framework NET7.0/NET8.0 self-contained console application reserving around 3GB RAM on Windows7 system #105388
  • Failure to copy files during CI build #105364
    9.0.0
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add test to induce buffer flush in StartWriteAsync #1502
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add tests for receiving HEADERS frame with PAD bit set and/or PRIORITY bit set #1494
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add tests that cause us to send a connection-level WINDOW_UPDATE #1497
  • HTTP2: Add functional test for multiple outstanding settings frames #1499
  • Test failure System.Tests.AppDomainTests.AssemblyLoad #94394
    Future
  • Type <class name> appears to be immutable, but no constructor found to accept values. #105318
  • Add tests for DataContractSerializer serializing System.Net.Cookie types #1490
  • IncompleteResponseStream_ResponseDropped_CancelsRequestToServer is incorrect for HTTP/1.1 #1484
  • Satellite assembly search in platform resource roots only uses exact culture casing #1019
  • Culture of assembly is not validated when loaded from subdirectory of parent assembly #1021
  • Version and culture of assembly returned by assembly loading extension points are not validated #1022
  • Test failure System.Tests.ConsoleKeyInfoTests.Equals_SameData(cki: System.ConsoleKeyInfo) #60240
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] Fail to launch grandnode with error "Some services are not able to be constructed" #105134
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Pull the python dependency from the EmsdkVersion where possible #105437
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105436
    area-Host
  • Update emsdk dependency to match what emsdk produces #105434
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Make ZLIB_DEBUG an option in zlib-ng to avoid suppressing WD4242 and WD4244 #105433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for nested types in the `corelib.h` parser for rooting descriptors #105432
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Fix double printing in StressLog and simplify stresslog macros #105420
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files #105419
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Use correct `ExceptionArgument` value in `System.IO.Pipelines` #105418
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Use filesystem name mapping on FreeBSD #105417
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • Update the ResourceData API #105416
    area-HostModel, 9.0.0
  • remove some test exclusions. #105415
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix platform analyzer attribute order for MacCatalyst #105409
    area-System.Security
  • Add swiftcall signature check for `mono_class_try_get_swift_error_class` #105408
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Clean up some usages of LowLevelList<T> #105407
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `BinaryPrimitives` more in the ILCompiler #105404
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Set xunit env var to not print output for passing tests #105392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [.NET 10] Move ProduceReferenceAssembly=false setting to specific places #105391
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places #105380
    area-Meta
  • ILVerify: Added option `--suppress-unverifiable` #105376
    area-ILVerification
  • ILVerify: Added option `--suppress-type-verification` #105375
    area-ILVerification
  • Testing for #80666 #105372
    NO-REVIEW
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions (second attempt) #105371
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix passing float and uint arguments in VM #105021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105337
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    GCStress, area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix warning for MakeGenericType annotation mismatch #104921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Light up support for OpenSSL ENGINEs only if they are available. #104994
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Fix platform analyzer attribute order for MacCatalyst #105410
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Mark the new tensor APIs as experimental for .NET 9 #105378
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Change DefaultMaximumErrorResponseLength to KB from Byte #105396
    area-System.Net
  • Don't overbuild source generator when root building for net48 #105347
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-preview7] [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #105298
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Convert Perl scripts to C# in coreclr #104867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump main to RC1 #105338
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bumping clang and llvm - make docs less ambiguous. #105401
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix LINQ Aggregate/CountBy tests for Native AOT #105357
    area-System.Linq
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix codespaces build by bumping clang llvm #105385
    arch-wasm, os-linux, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105153
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile property #105327
    area-Meta, needs-area-label
  • Slightly improve MinOpts JIT TP #105250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Improve iOS sample Makefile #105316
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix DeepEquals_DeepJsonDocument stack overflow that manifests in xunit.console and netfx. #105309
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update sln files again #105340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete unnecessary null checks #105382
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure linux uses zlib-ng and not system ZLIB #105352
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105356
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Disable unhandled exception tests on macos x64 #105342
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix span write in `InvariantCreateSortKeyOrdinalIgnoreCase` #105344
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, Future
  • Fix DAC stack overflow in GetUsefulGlobals API #105366
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Mark the new tensor APIs as experimental for .NET 9 #105268
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-enable ConsoleKeyInfoTests.Equals_SameData test #105355
    area-System.Console
  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Ensure linux uses zlib-ng and not system ZLIB #105354
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2501976 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Debugger should not manage exceptions during shutdown #105270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Base 64 decoder, reject input when unused bits are not 0 #105262
    area-System.Memory
  • Ensure that WaitForPendingFinalizers has seen the expected Full GC count #105289
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Add FFR register liveness tracking #105348
    arm-sve
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [EventSource] Relax assert on CounterGroup callback #105341
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • JIT: Introduce VNWalkPhis and use in VNNeverNegative as an example #105197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support field access on GetType() of T constrained to be Enum #105351
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update mono to support shuffle for constant inputs #105299
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update runtime metrics tests to avoid failures on some platforms #105300
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Avoid NullReferenceException in CharEnumerator after calling Dispose #105296
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, blocked, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Revert "Use generic math for floating point formatting" for Single and Double #105038
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added regression test for issue #94660 #105360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool for deadlock analysis #42348
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Reduce the amount of work required to build apps for multiple platforms #42344
  • Publishing native AOT fails on Fedora 40, Documentation suggests packages only for Ubuntu #42335

Closed

  • Workload related errors with nightlies #42334

PullRequests

Created

  • Enabled NativeAOT for Arm in SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/sdk.proj #42351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Switch to build.ubuntu.2204.amd64 image for VMR linux builds #42345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .NET 9 p6 to p7 in the table #42332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #42288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Preview 7] Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24373.1 #42343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the corext overlay package as it's not used anymore as far as we know #42326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Forward port 41996 #42315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat, stale
  • Utilize build script args to specify target rid #42293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `params in` parameters #8301
  • [Proposal]: Better conversion from collection expression with `ReadOnlySpan<T>` overloads #8297
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Proposal: extend the set of things allowed in expression trees #2545
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update first-class Span speclet #8312
  • Fix notes #8311

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Copilot Rename Suggestions: No suggestions for identifiers referenced in methods that touch the end of file #74545
  • Collection expressions apply to types implementing IEnumerable<T> and containing an Add(X) method but no implicit conversion between X and T #74543
  • String interpolation of only strings should light-up with string.Concat(params ReadOnlySpan<string>) #74538
    .NET 9
  • CSharpSemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo returns SymbolInfo with Symbol equal to null #74537
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName from CompilerVisibleItemMetadata #74533

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35123.88 #74532

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix URI handling when comparing encoded and unencoded URIs #74544
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rerun generators when an additional file is saved. #74542
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report fading locations as part of the main diagnostic #74541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move more code down to shared layer #74539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Cherry pick project system workspace update fix to 17.11 #74506
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adds support for metadata LSP language features in VSCode #74488
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74531
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Cleanup LSP error reporting #74530
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include InterpolatedString conversions in standard implicit conversion from expression assert #74529
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for partial properties #74494
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions (alt) #74495
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Instance extensions: prevent user's code from changing value of receiver when it has reference type and is passed by reference. #74508
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spa Services running only react pages ? #56976
  • [9.0-preview7] Response schema being returned as IResult #56975
  • Add option to specify custom OpenAPI output file name like Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli #56973
  • .NET 8 - '_framework/blazor.web.js' requires Authentication for some reason #56970
  • Perf regression: json, json #56963
  • Provide a simple opt-out option of preserving statically rendered components during navigation #56961
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Enum as API method's parameter ignoring naming policy when binding #56907
  • What should I do to build aspnet offline? #56776
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56969
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56968
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56967
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56966
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56965
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #56964
  • Blazor SSR page - start downloading WASM in background #56944
  • The website is called before pressing enter ASP.NET Core MVC #56971
  • Perf regression: json #56942
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #56955

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.JSInterop.JS version to 9.0.0 #56983
    area-blazor
  • Go back to checked-in minified .js files #56982
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix typo in variable name: hasExplictValue -> hasExplicitValue #56981
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update warning suppressions and cache ParameterInfo[] in generated code #56979
    area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Skip timing out MVC template tests in 8.0 #56978
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Add option to specify custom OpenAPI output file name like Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli #56974
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use Base64Url in WebEncoders #56959
    area-networking, 9.0.0

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make our aar file generation work with msbuild #23819
    .NET 9 Planning
  • XCode 16 support #23817
  • The icon on MacOS does not change in the application. #23816
  • Can't take photos on MacOS #23815
  • MAUI app on Android can't load a native Android lib (.so) #23808
  • A Slider control that's rotated by 90 degrees does not respect boundaries #23806
  • The name 'InitializeComponent' does not exist in the current context still is not fixed! #23805
  • EntryPointNotFoundException in Release mode with nested resources #23804
  • FlyoutItem in overlow menu not fully interactable #23803
  • Badge vor ToolbarItem #23802
    Backlog
  • [Android] Span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #23801
  • Frame-Switch element with shadow #23800
  • The underlying connection was closed: Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel. #23799
  • Binding context in ContentPresenter #23797
    Backlog
  • net8.0-android34.0 - Deployment failed on Android device with error XABLD7023: Could not find a part of the path (Microsoft.Maui.Controls.resources.dll) #23796
  • Border stroke not working #23794
  • When the date is changed, the DatePicker (Format="D") text didn't keep format. #23793
  • MAUI 8.0 webview not loading youtube video in iOS #23792
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use local variables in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23791
  • [WIN] MAUI Not Returning and Sending Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Input.PreviewKeyDown Event When Subscribed. #23789
  • iOS application crashed on startup. Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia.dll incompatible with aot? #23788

Closed

  • Provide a cross platform API for customizing the TitleBar of desktop apps #13023
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Connecting or Disconnecting Physical Barcode Reader is triggering App Return to Initial Index Page #18618
  • LinearGradientBrush as StaticResource is not working #23812
  • Unable to set FlyoutItem icon for Android #23807
  • [iOS] CollectionView with GridItemsLayout and footer, renders the cell in the center if is just one cell #23795
  • Frame not fitting to changing label #23790
  • Support debuging windows unpackaged app #23598
  • Unable to create the iOS build using the command line from Windows Machine #23609
  • Unable to deploy to iphone iOS 17.2.1 from VS 2022 #19738
  • Invalid Zero Length check expression #23782
    Backlog
  • Programmatic name is not given for "Hamburger" button: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_Home Screen_AI4MAC #22904
    .NET 8 SR8

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump previous MAUI version to current release version #23818
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • [draft][XAML] `OnPlatform` doesn't work with `AppThemeBinding` in Release mode #23798
    community ✨
  • Updating Maui templates to build unpackaged Windows apps by default #23787
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #23786
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23752
    9.0-preview7
  • `IWindow.Content` can be null in Core #23775
  • [net9.0] Delete obsolete Mappers #23712
  • [ci] Move to push nightly to a template #23811
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Add scheduled push to nightly feed job #23721
    area-infrastructure
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [Accessibility] Add accessibility label to the menu button #23762
    t/a11y
  • Move WebViewDidNotLeak to UITest #23784
  • Stop using `IPlatformSizeService` #23725

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Add HandlerProperties.DisconnectPolicy for controlling when DisconnectHandler is called #23738
  • Fire UpdateValue after all propertychange events #23746
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • Make IWindow.Content nullable #23785
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView not showing new items #23779
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix Android ImageView flickering between images and drawable disappearing when shell section is removed from FragmentManager #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Binding SG] Add inaccessible member access and not-static lambdas diagnostics #23671
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, do-not-merge, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linq to SQL Query seeking records where date is == to max date returning wrong records #34283
  • change LogExecutedCommand elapsed parameter from string to int or do not send thousands seperator #34281
  • GroupBySplitQueryingEnumerable not disposing related data readers #34280
  • Link https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-trimming is broken #34279

Closed

  • Unexpected semantics if .All() predicate evaluates to NULL for some rows? #34271
  • ExecuteSqlRaw() works but ExecuteSql() no longer does #34277

PullRequests

Created

  • Translate Order & OrderDescending #34282

Updated

  • Trial and error #34284
  • Fix to #34211 - Issue occurs when trying to generate query string when mapping entity with json to a view with a custom schema #34239
  • Add support for database window functions - WIP #34258
  • Implement nullability simplification for `COLLATE` and `AT TIME ZONE` #34263
